articles.description: A new trend surfaced over the holiday weekend in which moviegoers dress up in formalwear to go see Minions: The Rise of Gru and then post on TikTok to the song “Rich Minion” by Yeat. Here’s what’s behind the trend.

articles.title: Eric Holder found guilty of murdering Nipsey Hussle in 2019 - Daily Mail
articles.description: Eric Holder has been convicted for the murder of rapper Nipsey Hussle. Holder was charged with murder and two counts of attempted murder in the 2019 shooting outside a Los Angeles clothing store.
articles.content:
Eric Ronald Holder Jr., 32, has been convicted for the murder of Grammy-nominated rapper Nipsey Hussle on Wednesday.
